column5: 10 min to Medical Center/NRG stadium, shopping close by, 20 minutes to downtown. Walking distance to two bus lines and easy access to light rail. Large bedroom with WiFi, cable TV, queen bed, closet. Relaxing, peaceful home, great for studying/working, kitchen access. Residential street parking or driveway. Complimentary coffee every morning and snacks. My house is your house! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Home away from home. Centrally located
